short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instant case law insights and AI-powered custom summaries when and where you need them.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Instantly find case law information for decisions cited in the document you are viewing in Chrome! Jurisage MyJr gives you relevant information, in the context you need it, without disrupting your legal research flow.

Jurisage MyJr will automatically detect the citations present in any website you are navigating, be it a case law research website such as Westlaw or CanLII, or even a legal blob, and present extra information about a case when you hover over its citation. Moreover, MyJr also gives you access to Jurisage's dashboard, which contains further case details as well as advanced AI-based tools, such as "chat with a case" and case summarization.
